EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-nurture Utilities-T0021Q.Stream 1_Email 9_Teleprotection vi
EmailTemplate.subject: Which teleprotection migration approach is best?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Network engineering at its best Teleprotection over IP/MPLS Migrating teleprotection traffic to a packet-based network is a considerable challenge. Any solution has to meet stringent QoS requirements in order to assure continous and reliable communications while avoiding grid disturbances due to out-of-bound jitter, latency, or delay asymmetry. To reduce costs, it’s also advisable to migrate this traffic with other applications to a single, converged IP/MPLS network <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fsyDQMKR7ys&feature=youtu.be?did=d000000000e4&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=teleprotection-video&utm_term=marketo]]>. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
